<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1313</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Spiral ABC+words (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spirale ABC+words (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spirale ABC+words (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espiral ABC+words (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spirale ABC+words (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπειροειδές ABC+words (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espiral ABC+words (2)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">print out the file, put papers through a spiral, and cut along the lines. Then play a matching game of capital, small letters+ picture that matches</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning to read</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capital letters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">drucken Sie aus der Datei, führen Sie Papiere 
durch eine Spirale, hindurch und schneiden Sie entlang die 
Zeilen. Spielen Sie dann ein zusammenpassendes Spiel der Haupt-,
kleinen letters+ Abbildung, die zusammenpaßt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">imprimez hors du fichier, mettez les papiers par 
une spirale, et coupez le long des lignes. Jouez alors un jeu 
assorti de l'image capitale et petite de letters+ qui s'assortit</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imprima para fora da lima, passe papéis com uma 
espiral, e corte-os ao longo das linhas. Jogue então um jogo 
combinando do retrato importante, pequeno de letters+ que combina</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stampi verso l'esterno l'archivio, faccia passare
le carte con una spirale e tagli seguendo le righe. Allora gioc 
un gioco di corrispondenza dell'immagine capitale e piccola di 
letters+ che abbina</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το τυπωμένο κείμενο το αρχείο, έβαλε τα έγγραφα μέσω
μιας σπείρας, και έκοψε σύμφωνα με τις γραμμές. Κατόπιν 
παίξτε ένα ταιριάζοντας με παιχνίδι των κύριων, μικρών 
γραμμάτων + της εικόνας που ταιριάζει με</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imprima fuera del fichero, pase los papeles con 
un espiral, y corte a lo largo de las líneas. Entonces juegue 
un juego que corresponde con del cuadro capital, pequeño de letters+ 
que corresponde con</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernen zu lesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großbuchstaben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
